name: sample-playable-ad
description: A template for Google Web Designer playable ad content.

scripts.minify: cd sample/sample_playable/assets && uglifyjs --compress -o main.min.js -- playable.js playable_*.js sample_*.js
scripts.dist: npm run minify_dist && npm run debug_dist
scripts.debug_dist: uglifyjs --beautify -o dist/playable.js -- sample/sample_playable/assets/playable.js sample/sample_playable/assets/playable_*.js && cp sample/sample_playable/assets/easeljs.js sample/sample_playable/assets/tweenjs.js sample/sample_playable/assets/preloadjs.js dist/

author: Xyla
